description: After being missing for more than three decades, the famed "Woman Ocre" painting by Willem De Koonig was discovered in Silver Springs, New Mexico after it was purchased at an auction. ABC's Ron Claiborne reports.
maintext: After being missing for more than three decades, the famed "Woman Ocre" painting by Willem De Koonig was discovered in Silver Springs, New Mexico after it was purchased at an auction. ABC's Ron Claiborne reports.
title: Lost art is rediscovered
